successes.title: Pebble Time - Awesome Smartwatch, No Compromises
successes.description: Color e-paper smartwatch with up to 7 days of battery and a new timeline interface that highlights what's important in your day.

Pledges.description: EARLY BIRD: Your choice of one Pebble Time watch in any of the three colors. Regular retail price will be $199.
Your choice of one Pebble Time watch in any of the three colors. Regular retail price will be $199.
Your choice of one Pebble Time watch in any of the three colors. Regular retail price will be $199.
Your choice of one Pebble Time Steel watch in your choice of color. Includes a leather strap and extra metal strap. Regular retail price will be $299.
Your choice of one Pebble Time Steel watch in your choice of color. Includes a leather strap and extra metal strap. Regular retail price will be $299.
TWO (2) Pebble Time watches - any combination of the three colors.
COMBO: One (1) Pebble Time and One (1) Pebble Time Steel in you choice of colors. Time Steel will include both a leather strap and an extra matching metal strap.
TWO (2) Pebble Time Steel watches - any combination of the three colors. Both Include a leather strap and extra metal strap. Regular retail price will be $598.
TWO (2) Pebble Time Steel watches - any combination of the three colors. Both Include a leather strap and extra metal strap. Regular retail price will be $598.
FIVE (5) Pebble Time watches - any combination of the three colors.
TEN (10) Pebble Time watches - any combination of the three colors.

DISTRIBUTOR TIER - TEN OF EACH COLOR (10 x 3) Pebble Time watches - contact us at ksdisty@getpebble.com if you want a different combination of colors. Shipping and customs to be arranged directly with Pebble.
